ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2001_01_10: Hm? Did you need to consult me?
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
I’m proud of this Trainer Lodge I made! You
should stick around and use it to relax!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
We’ve known each other for a while now, haven’t
we? It’s not bad, relaxing here with you...
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2101_02_10: It’s a present from me! So be grateful and use it!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2102_01_10: Here, you can have this. No need to thank me.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Hmph. Don’t fret—I just happened to have it
on hand.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
You’ve helped me a lot. This is the least I can do
as thanks!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
I’ll keep sending you gifts as a way to thank you
for the work you’re doing, so keep it up!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2201_01_10:
You have something to talk about? Very well,
let me hear it.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I’ve specially set aside some time for you. Go on,
start talking!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Is that for me? Thank you, I suppose.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2301_01_10: You’ve got decent taste. Thank you—I’ll keep it.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
That said, I don’t like being indebted to anyone! I’ll
be thanking you with something grand, so be
ready for it!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
This wasn’t bad, as far as spending time goes.
I’ll join you again when the opportunity arises.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Oh, I lost track of time talking to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Aside from my retainers, I don’t think I’ve ever
talked to anyone this much.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
The Trainer Lodge is a facility I created so that
Trainers can get to know each other better!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
There are Trainers you’d like to chat with, right?
If so, invite them and interact a bit!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
What? You want to chat more with ME? You sure
have odd taste!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
My retainers and I work hard day and night to
ensure all sync pairs are content.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8002_0701_02_10: However, we do tend to have similar mindsets...
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
That’s why I need your commoner opinions! In
fact, I’m counting on them! Don’t hold back—let
me hear them!
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
In the past, I didn’t rely on or believe in anyone
else’s power...just my own.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
But when I think back on those days, all I
remember are the times Sawyer, Rachel, and
Hoopa helped me out.
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Lately, I’ve been getting all sorts of help from
meddlesome, overly compassionate people...
ch0066_01_boss_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
I can say now with confidence that these countless
bonds will be my greatest power as king!
